import React,{useState} from 'react' /**
<Form /> this.setState({ companyName: event.target.value })} placeholder="Enter Company Name" required />
*/ const Items = (props) => { // console.log(props) const [itemName,setItemName] = useState(props.item.name) const [itemAmount,setItemAmount] = useState(props.item.amount) return (

{itemName}-{itemAmount}

<Form /> setItemName( event.target.value )} />
) } export default Items
